![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)     In a study that surveyed large firms in Europe and the United States, Dr. Brunswicker and Dr. Henry Chesbrough (UC Berkeley) examine the extent to which large firms are practicing open innovation.  As the world continues to move towards a more openly innovative environment, businesses, too, continue to adopt more open innovation practices. This study will be published in the March-April issue of the Research-Technology Management (RTM) Journal. To see this article, please go to _Research‐Technology Management_ (_RTM_) online at [www.iriweb.org/rtm](http://www.iriweb.org/rtm).
